meta.content: You can contact us on 0879099391 or visit our contact page on our website: www.natureshealthclinic.ie We are located in Portlaoise, on the Mountrath Road, in county Laois. Check Google places for business to see our location. Located just 2 minutes drive from the M7 motorway we have very easy access. Parking is free and is wheelchair friendly.

td.p: Address: Mountrath Road Portlaoise. County Laois.

If you have any questions regarding Acupuncture, our Acupuncture Fertility Treatments or our Pain relief treatments or any of our services, or if you would like to book a treatment, you can contact us by phone or by filling out this form and we'll get back to you as soon as possible. Hope to hear from you soon.
